mapper.select: SELECT r.POINTCODE AS pointCode, r.RULEEXPRESSIONS AS formula, r.POLLUTECODE AS polluteCode, r.ALARMCODE AS alarmCode, r.ALERTTYPE AS alarmType, NVL(r.RULEDUR, 0) AS durTime, dataType, site.STDPOINTCODE MN, r.ISEFFECT as isEffect, r.ISGENALARM as isGenAlarm FROM V_BAS_ALERTRULE r LEFT JOIN T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST site ON r.pointCode = site.pointCode WHERE r.RULEEXPRESSIONS IS NOT NULL AND site.STDPOINTCODE IS NOT NULL AND site.status IN (0, 1) AND pollutecode IS NOT NULL

SELECT r.RULEID, r.RULEEXPRESSIONS AS formula, r.ALARMCODE AS alarmCode, NVL(r.DURATION, 0) AS durTime, v.STDPOINTCODE MN, v.pointCode, d.ALMTYPEID FROM T_BAS_ALM_RULE_CONFIG r, T_BAS_ALM_RULE_STATION s, T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST v , T_BAS_ALM_DEF d WHERE r.RULEID = s.RULEID AND v.POINTCODE = s.POINTCODE AND r.ALARMCODE = d.ALARMCODE

SELECT r.POINTCODE AS pointCode, r.RULEEXPRESSIONS AS formula, r.POLLUTECODE AS polluteCode, r.ALARMCODE AS alarmCode, r.ALERTTYPE AS alarmType, NVL(r.RULEDUR, 0) AS durTime, dataType, site.STDPOINTCODE MN, r.ISEFFECT as isEffect, r.ISGENALARM as isGenAlarm FROM V_BAS_ALERTRULE r LEFT JOIN T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST site ON r.pointCode = site.pointCode WHERE r.RULEEXPRESSIONS IS NOT NULL AND site.STDPOINTCODE IS NOT NULL AND site.status IN (0, 1) AND pollutecode IS NOT NULL
AND site.STDPOINTCODE=#{MN}

SELECT POINTCODE AS pointCode, POLLUTECODE AS polluteCode, ALARMCODE AS alarmCode, STARTTIME AS startTime, ENDTIME AS endTime, ALARMVALUE AS alarmValue, 1 AS isStorage, dataType FROM T_BAS_ALMINFO WHERE ENDTIME IS NULL

SELECT P.POINTCODE pointCode, P.POINTNAME pointName, STDPOINTCODE AS MN, RTCYCLETIME AS rCycle, MICYCLETIME AS mInterval, RTCYCLETIME AS rInterval, regionCode, SYSTEMTYPE AS ST, STATUS AS onlineStatus, D.datatime AS heartTime FROM T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST P LEFT JOIN (SELECT pointcode,MAX(datatime) datatime FROM T_BAS_DATALATEST GROUP BY pointcode) D ON P.POINTCODE = D.POINTCODE where STATUS IN (0, 1)

SELECT P.POINTCODE pointCode, STDPOINTCODE AS MN, RTCYCLETIME AS rCycle, regionCode, SYSTEMTYPE AS ST, STATUS AS onlineStatus, D.datatime AS heartTime FROM T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST P LEFT JOIN (SELECT pointcode,MAX(datatime) datatime FROM T_BAS_DATALATEST GROUP BY pointcode) D on P.POINTCODE = D.POINTCODE WHERE STATUS IN (0, 1)
AND STDPOINTCODE=#{MN}
SELECT regionCode, COUNT(1) AS total FROM T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST WHERE regionCode IS NOT NULL AND STATUS IN (0, 1) AND SYSTEMTYPE=22 GROUP BY regioncode
SELECT regionCode, COUNT(1) AS total FROM T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST WHERE regionCode IS NOT NULL AND STATUS IN (0, 1) AND SYSTEMTYPE=22 AND regionCode=#{regionCode} GROUP BY regioncode
SELECT ALARMCODE AS alarmCode, GENERALCODE AS statusCode FROM T_BAS_ALARMSTATUSCODE
SELECT systemtype AS ST, pname AS tableName FROM T_DIC_POINTSYSTYPE WHERE pname IS NOT NULL

SELECT p.POINTCODE, STARTDATE AS bDateTime, ENDDATE AS eDateTime FROM T_PS_PMS_EXCEPTION_APP e, T_PS_PMS_EXCEPTION_APP_PLIST p WHERE e.APPID = p.APPID AND e.APPLY_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY STARTDATE ASC,ENDDATE ASC

SELECT pointCode, WEEK, NVL(to_char(STARTTIME,'hh24:mi:ss'), '00:00:00') AS startTime, NVL(to_char(ENDTIME,'hh24:mi:ss'), '23:59:59') AS endTime FROM T_PS_PMS_REGULARSTOPTIME where STARTTIME is not null and ENDTIME is not null ORDER BY STARTTIME ASC,ENDTIME ASC
SELECT EMISSIONPERIOD FROM T_PS_BAS_ENTERMANAGE a WHERE pscode=#{psCode} AND YEARMN=#{yearMN}
select s.POINTCODE from T_BAS_ALM_RULE_CONFIG c join T_BAS_ALM_RULE_STATION s on s.RULEID = c.RULEID where c.ALARMCODE = '90093'
select s.POINTCODE from T_BAS_ALM_RULE_CONFIG c join T_BAS_ALM_RULE_STATION s on s.RULEID = c.RULEID where c.ALARMCODE = '90094'
